description: Mansard roof extension including raising the party wall and chimney to number 44 Walsingham Road.
decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline;">Swifts:</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved a minimum of one</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;Swift nesting brick and/or box shall be provided at or close to eaves level of the development hereby approved. The bricks/boxes shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-1d4f08eb-7fff-57a0-4de9-fd0c83b8c52a"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: in the interests of biodiversity.</span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The materials used in any exterior work shall be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse except where different materials are specified in the submitted application.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-e8ac8956-7fff-a1c4-b5c7-6fcd2a03aeb2"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the proposal does not detract from the character and appearance of the surrounding area</span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">. </span></p>
